name: Classic Borscht
description: A traditional beet soup with a rich, hearty flavor, served with sour cream.

name: Green Borscht
description: A refreshing variation made with sorrel, giving it a distinct tangy taste.

name: Chicken Borscht
description: A wholesome beet soup with tender chicken pieces, adding a rich, savory depth.

name: Vegan Borscht
description: A delicious, plant-based version of the classic, made with fresh vegetables and no animal products.

name: Borscht with Dumplings
description: Traditional beet soup served with soft, savory dumplings for added texture and flavor.

name: Spicy Borscht
description: A fiery take on the traditional borscht, spiced with chili peppers for extra heat.

name: Beef Borscht
description: Hearty borscht made with tender beef chunks, adding rich, meaty flavors.

name: Cold Borscht
description: A chilled version of the classic beet soup, perfect for hot summer days.

name: Mushroom Borscht
description: A savory borscht made with a variety of wild mushrooms for an earthy, umami flavor.

name: Borscht with Pork
description: Rich and filling beet soup made with tender pork pieces.

name: Seafood Borscht
description: An exotic variation made with a mix of fresh seafood, giving it a unique twist.

name: Sweet and Sour Borscht
description: A flavorful blend of sweet and sour tastes, made with a mix of beets and vinegar.

name: Borscht with Beans
description: A protein-rich version of the classic beet soup, with added beans for extra nutrition.

name: Garlic Borscht
description: Borscht with a strong garlic flavor, perfect for garlic lovers.

name: Borscht with Cabbage
description: A classic borscht enhanced with crunchy cabbage for added texture.
